messages.message:
Our CI sandboxes are failing to start right now, here's an example: https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/pr-67592-cypress?cw=dev

It's saying that this is the error in the nginx-ready probe: `HTTP GET /static/output/ibapp_aihub.bundle.js`
that's just the startup probe indicating webpack isn't ready yet, which appears to be happening because we're failing to connect to `crafting-cyp`
Ahh okay, let me check out that sandbox
weirdly, it looks like some of the cypress sandboxes are coming up though :thonk:
we could try deleting one of the stuck ones, retrigger the cypress test action, and check whether that comes up ok?
I just force merged my PR, let me double check it wasn't an issue with that one. Although it is happening for some other PRs too
In my PR it was stuck, I had deleted it and retried the aciton to no avail, same issue
yeah I see that as well, I'm checking whether this is happening to other templates too
Running from my own sandbox seems to have worked :thonk:

I also force-killed the `cs k8s connect` process that was stuck on https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/pr-67687-cypress?cw=dev -- when it retried after the command succeeded. @Jessica I think this may have been a transient issue with starting interception -- I'll look into cleaning up any others that appear stuck and whether we can set an upper bound on how long we wait for a connection to be established

Yeah no idea why we started to see a bunch of them hang -- if you see this happen again before I have an answer on setting a timeout, you can run the following to unblock the sandbox

```cs ssh -W SANDBOX_NAME/dev -- pkill --echo cs```
